title: issue_history v2: Add templated internal decision notes (why/next steps) as timeline events

sections.text: Implement support in issue_history v2 for standardized internal triage decision notes captured as structured timeline events (template id + fields like decision, why, next_steps, owner/team, timestamp). Persist notes immutably and expose them via the issue history API with basic validation/sanitization so they can be searched and displayed consistently. Ensure notes can be linked to relevant lifecycle transitions (e.g., triaged, deprioritized, blocked) without duplicating ownership/SLA logic from existing tickets.
